channel.title: Is this why?

item.title: Is this why?
item.dc:creator: @codeusa codeusa
item.description:
@codeusa wrote:

[quote=“chassy13, post:12, topic:200020”]Aj how did you add starting outfit? Im having troubles =(

I have this in player.java but when the person joins they dont have the items equipped:

    //Giving the player an unique look
                /*playerEquipment[playerHat]= 1153;
                playerEquipment[playerCape]= 1007;
                playerEquipment[playerAmulet]= 1725;
                playerEquipment[playerChest]= 1115;
                playerEquipment[playerShield]= 1191;
                playerEquipment[playerLegs]= 1067;
                playerEquipment[playerHands]= 1059;
                playerEquipment[playerFeet]= 1061();
                playerEquipment[playerRing]=Item.randomRing();
                playerEquipment[playerArrows]=Item.randomArrows();
                playerEquipment[playerWeapon]= 1323;*/[/code][/quote]


Thoes numbers are the item id's  of the items mines looks like this



[code]playerEquipment[playerHat]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerCape]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerChest]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerShield]=1171;
		playerEquipment[playerLegs]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerHands]=2902;
		playerEquipment[playerFeet]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=1205;

get the ids you want and put them there

Read full topic

item.title: Is this why?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I was changing the starter outfit, and it looks like this:

//Giving the player an unique look /*playerEquipment[playerHat]= 1153; playerEquipment[playerCape]= 1007; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]= 1725; playerEquipment[playerChest]= 1115; playerEquipment[playerShield]= 1191; playerEquipment[playerLegs]= 1067; playerEquipment[playerHands]= 1059; playerEquipment[playerFeet]= 1061; playerEquipment[playerRing]= -1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]= -1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]= 1323;*/

I compile, no errors. But when I log in on a new account, I don’t have the items equipped. BUT, before i can actually see my character, the char pop-up thing comes up for selecting your characters normal clothes, than when your done, it goes to what you made that… Would that be the reason that it is not showing equipping the starter outfit?

Read full topic
